title: es6-css-minify
body: es6-css-minify is a open-source VS Code extension that lets you minify JavaScript, CSS and generate source maps with a simple click. View source on Github or download from the VSC Marketplace.

title: Chickens Attack Helicopters
body: Chickens Attack Helicopters is an online implementation of the popular table top party game Cards Against Humanity. It's a game for truly horrible people. Play it on cah.ninja or contribute to the game on GitHub.

title: Library Loader
body: Library Loader is a free and open source implementations of the SamacSys Library Loader. This version is compatible with all three major platforms: Windows, Max and Linux!

title: Autoplank
body: Use plank on multi-monitor setups with ease.

title: rdg-linux
body: rdg-linux is a simple front-end application for the CLI tool rdesktop. This was created for people that don't like using the terminal for everything. View source or download on Github.

title: Shoplistic
body: Shoplistic is a shopping list app which allows you to scan barcodes to add item to the shopping list. Shoplistic also provides hardware for physical scanners for your kitchen!
